review: I have been trying to fine a easy way to get netflix and youtube in my bedroom.  This is a slick, easy to use way that beats getting a smart blu ray player.  it's easy to use and navigate and  even the simple remote is nice. it responds quickly unlike older apple tv, where the movement on the cursor when using the remote is slow.  For the price you can't beat it. It's to bad that HDMI isn't like USB where it could power a device that would definately give 5 stars.  great packaging and presentation.  Set up is idiot proof.
